pr_title: [BEAM-4374, BEAM-6189] Delete and remove deprecated Metrics proto

timeline.message:
[BEAM-4374, BEAM-6189] Delete and remove deprecated Metrics proto

This completes the migration off of the Metrics proto to the MonitoringInfo proto.

timeline.bodyText:
Why are these also deprecated now?
Will you be only using the bytes map now? I don't really get how this will work by looking at the ProcessBundle(Progress)Response protos. It seems like you would need the MonitoringInfo at least once to have enough metadata be able to decode the bytes and associate multiple updates together. I don't really understand the protocol that you have in mind here.
timeline.author: ajamato

replies.bodyText:
The plan is to go with short ids system as the one and only implementation and may not have enough time to remove these two fields before the 2.21 release.
I want to have the option to un-deprecate them or remove them after the release.
replies.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: sgtm, Using ProcessBundleProgressMetadata should be called after the get the IDs, makes sense.
replies.author: ajamato

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this won't break existing integrations? I believe only the Python and Java SDK have moved everything to MonitoringInfos. The Go SDK has not yet
timeline.author: ajamato

replies.bodyText:
Go SDK has, @lostluck and I worked on the changes. See: 
  
    
      beam/sdks/go/pkg/beam/core/runtime/harness/monitoring.go
    
    
         Line 204
      in
      aff4461
    
    
    
    

        
          
           func monitoring(p *exec.Plan) (*fnpb.Metrics, []*ppb.MonitoringInfo, map[string][]byte) {
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText: You way want to add this back, if you truly cannot yet delete the deprecated metrics
timeline.author: ajamato

replies.bodyText: Which deprecated metrics are you referring to?
replies.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: The legacy metrics proto deleted in this PR. You may want to check with to make sure no other runner is consuming this.
replies.author: ajamato
